    MakeReservation.makeReservation(Hotel hotel, boolean walkIn)
    Method will make a reservation for the guest, an Exception would be thrown when error encountered Method will also check if the customer has any discounts, will ensure discounts (in percentage), will return a positive value less than 100 [i.e.

  • Uses of Reservation in hotel

    Methods in hotel that return Reservation
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Reservation
    Hotel.getEarliestReservation(ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
    getEarliestReservation method allows the earliest reserver details to be retrieved from the Hotel class (and hence no changes to the Room AvailStatus).
    Reservation
    ReservationListManipulator.getEntry()
    To be called in checkin function this method allows the Reservation Object to be instantiated
    Reservation
    ReservationListManipulator.getEntry(ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
    this method is the opposite of the above method; it returns the Reservation Object for the given ArrayList of reservation Method Overloading is used in this case
    Reservation
    Hotel.getReservation()
    getReservation method allows the reservation to be retrieved from the Hotel class An Exception would also be thrown upon an error
    Methods in hotel that return types with arguments of type Reservation
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ArrayList<Reservation>
    Hotel.getReservationList()
    this method retrieves the reservation list in the Hotel class
    ArrayList<Reservation>
    Hotel.getRoomReservationList(Room room)
    getRoomReservationList method returns a list of all reservations for that given room in the Hotel class
    ArrayList<Reservation>
    ReservationListManipulator.getRoomReservations(Room room)
    this method is to be called in the make reservation class upon its instantiation
    Methods in hotel with parameters of type Reservation
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Hotel.addGuests(Reservation reservation)
    addGuests method allows the guest to be added into the Hotel class (and hence Room AvailStatus to be marked as OCCUPIED) An Exception would also be thrown upon an error
    void
    Hotel.addReservation(Reservation reservation)
    addReservation method allows the reserver to be added into the Hotel class (and hence Room AvailStatus to be marked as RESERVED) An Exception would also be thrown upon an error
    void
    Hotel.removeGuests(Reservation reservation)
    removeGuests method allows the guest to be removed from the Hotel class (and hence Room AvailStatus to be marked as VACANT).
    void
    Hotel.removeReservation(Reservation reservation)
    removeReservation method allows the reserver to be removed from the Hotel class (and hence Room AvailStatus to be marked as VACANT).
    Method parameters in hotel with type arguments of type Reservation

    Reservation
    ReservationListManipulator.getEntry(ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
    this method is the opposite of the above method; it returns the Reservation Object for the given ArrayList of reservation Method Overloading is used in this case

    static Reservation
    CreateReservation.createReservation(Room room, int numOfGuest, LocalDateTime checkInDateTime, LocalDateTime checkOutDateTime)
    Instantiation of the Reservation object this includes details such as the room, number of guest, check-in date-time and also check-out date-time When reset method in room called; will auto assign upcoming reservation to reservation attribute in room after guests checkout

  • Uses of Reservation in room

    Methods in room that return Reservation
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Reservation
    Room.getReservation()
    gets Reservation object of this room containing reservation details of this room;
    Methods in room with parameters of type Reservation
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Room.reset(Reservation reservation)
    Resets this room upon check out by guest(s) previously staying in this room by resetting roomService object (essentially the array of orders and total bill of orders) and roomFeature object of this room; Availability status of this room is set to VACANT if no more existing reservations after current and set to RESERVED if there are still more reservations; Used by Check out function; Follows the Single Responsibility principle as sole responsibility to reset this Room object;
    void
    Room.setReservation(Reservation reservation)
    sets reservation of this room using Reservation object;
